description: Detective arrives at crime scene and examines the body of James Wilson
detective_action: examines crime scene and body positioning
reader_revelation: The reader knows the conspirators positioned the body to look like a confrontation gone wrong
detective_learns: Victim is James Wilson, company auditor, found in parking garage

description: Detective interviews Alice who claims to have discovered the body
detective_action: interviews Alice about finding the body
reader_revelation: The reader sees Alice's rehearsed performance of shock and grief
detective_learns: Alice found body at 9:30 PM when returning for forgotten laptop

description: Detective discovers security footage gap during time of crime
detective_action: reviews security camera footage and logs
reader_revelation: The reader knows Bob deliberately created this gap
detective_learns: 15-minute gap in footage from 8:45-9:00 PM, attributed to maintenance

description: Detective identifies Eric Thompson as person of interest after interviews mention his threats
detective_action: compiles interview notes pointing to Eric Thompson
reader_revelation: The conspirators planted seeds about Eric months ago
detective_learns: Eric Thompson, fired 6 months ago, made threats against James

description: Detective interviews Eric who mentions seeing Bob near security office, but Bob proactively provides explanation
detective_action: interviews Eric Thompson about his whereabouts
conspirator_intervention: Bob proactively approaches detective with work order explaining his presence
reader_revelation: The reader watches Bob close off a potential discovery path
detective_learns: Eric claims innocence but Bob's explanation for security office presence is accepted

description: Detective verifies David's alibi through restaurant receipt provided by Carol
detective_action: checks David Chen's alibi at Maison Laurent
reader_revelation: The reader knows the dinner was staged specifically for this alibi
detective_learns: David Chen was at restaurant with Carol from 7:30-10:00 PM

description: Forensics finds industrial cleaner traces matching Eric's former apartment building
detective_action: reviews forensic analysis of crime scene
reader_revelation: Carol purchased this cleaner specifically to frame Eric
detective_learns: Chemical evidence links to Eric's known locations

description: Detective discovers Eric called James's office the day before the murder
reader_revelation: Eric actually called to apologize, but this looks incriminating
detective_learns: Eric made 12-minute call to James's office line

description: Detective finds threatening note in James's desk
detective_action: searches victim's office for additional evidence
reader_revelation: Alice planted this note two weeks ago
detective_learns: Threatening unsigned note found in victim's desk

description: David approaches detective with 'helpful' information about seeing Eric in parking garage
detective_action: receives tip from David Chen about Eric sighting
conspirator_intervention: David volunteers fabricated witness account of seeing Eric near garage
reader_revelation: The reader watches David actively misdirecting the investigation
detective_learns: David claims to have seen Eric lurking in parking garage two weeks ago

description: Detective constructs timeline that places Eric alone in building during murder window
reader_revelation: The reader sees how each piece was carefully orchestrated
detective_learns: All evidence points to Eric being present during camera gap

description: Eric's lawyer challenges evidence but cannot provide alternative theory
obstacle: Eric's lawyer raises technical objections about chain of custody
reader_revelation: The truth exists but has no evidence to support it
detective_learns: Case has weak spots but overall pattern is consistent

description: Detective notices slight hesitation from Alice but moment passes
conspirator_intervention: Alice quickly recovers from momentary slip
reader_revelation: Alice almost cracked but her preparation held
detective_learns: Alice appears genuinely traumatized by finding body

description: Detective finds Eric had reported financial irregularities before termination but investigation cleared company
reader_revelation: David conducted that 'investigation' himself, burying his own crimes
detective_learns: Eric's whistleblower claims were investigated and dismissed as baseless

description: DA approves arrest of Eric Thompson, who maintains innocence
detective_action: presents final case to district attorney
reader_revelation: The conspiracy succeeds as an innocent man is arrested
detective_learns: Case is circumstantial but consistent; Eric Thompson arrested
